actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the convening of an International Conference on Communication and Information, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the President to: (1) convene an International Conference on Communication and Information by January 1, 1982; (2) take steps to prepare for and host such conference; and (3) report to Congress the recommendations of such conference.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the convening of an International Conference on Communication and Information, and for other purposes.
